Operation 'getLocation' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, not_actionable. Original description lacks a summary and is incomplete. Added clarity about what is returned (location data with coordinates, accuracy, timestamp), clarified the purpose, and made it more actionable for AI agents to understand when to use this operation.

data.current_description: To retrieve a specific devices latest known location the /GetLocation method is used. Please note that the MiataruConfig portion is optional. RequestMiataruDeviceID should be the ID of the device the request is sent from (or an identifier like an URL).
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve the latest known location of a device
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the most recent location data for a specified device. Requires the device ID in the request. The MiataruConfig portion is optional. Returns the device's latest known location including coordinates, accuracy, and timestamp. RequestMiataruDeviceID should be the ID of the device the request is sent from or an identifier like a URL.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks a summary and is incomplete. Added clarity about what is returned (location data with coordinates, accuracy, timestamp), clarified the purpose, and made it more actionable for AI agents to understand when to use this operation.

message: Operation 'getLocationGeoJSON' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary and incomplete description. Added clarity about the required deviceID parameter, what GeoJSON structure is returned, and the use case context to help AI agents understand when this operation is appropriate.

data.current_description: Retrieves a devices Location in GeoJSON format.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve device location in GeoJSON format
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the latest location of a specified device in GeoJSON format. Requires the device ID as a path parameter. Returns a GeoJSON Feature object containing the device's coordinates, accuracy, and timestamp. Useful for mapping and geospatial applications.
data.reasoning: Missing summary and incomplete description. Added clarity about the required deviceID parameter, what GeoJSON structure is returned, and the use case context to help AI agents understand when this operation is appropriate.

message: Operation 'getLocationHistory' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_context. Missing summary and overly complex description. Reorganized to clarify the precondition (EnableLocationHistory must be enabled), what is returned (array of historical records), server-side behavior (automatic pruning), and required inputs. Made it more concise and AI-agent friendly.

data.current_description: Location History is stored on the server only if the client told the server to do so using the "EnableLocationHistory" setting in the Location Update requests. For transitions of enabling/disabling that functionality - Everytime a Location Update is received by the server with "EnableLocationHistory=false" the server removes all stored Location History till that point. There is a server-side setting that controls up to how many Location Updates the server is storing in the Location History before it removes the oldest one. To request the Location History of a particular device the client sends the following POST request to the GetLocationHistory service URL. Please note that the MiataruConfig portion is optional. RequestMiataruDeviceID should be the ID of the device the request is sent from (or an identifier like an URL).
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve historical location data for a device
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the stored location history for a specified device. Location history is only available if EnableLocationHistory was set to true in previous location updates. Returns an array of historical location records with timestamps. The server maintains a configurable maximum number of historical records per device; older records are automatically removed when the limit is exceeded. Requires the device ID in the request. The MiataruConfig portion is optional.
data.reasoning: Missing summary and overly complex description. Reorganized to clarify the precondition (EnableLocationHistory must be enabled), what is returned (array of historical records), server-side behavior (automatic pruning), and required inputs. Made it more concise and AI-agent friendly.

message: Operation 'getVisitorHistory' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_context. Missing summary and incomplete description. Clarified what 'visitor' means (clients accessing location data), what is returned (list of visitor records with identifiers and timestamps), and the automatic pruning behavior. This helps AI agents understand the operation's purpose and when to use it.

data.current_description: Visitor History is stored on the server with every request to the location or location history information of a device. There is a server-side setting that controls up to how many Visitors the server is storing in the Visitor History before it removes the oldest one. To request the Visitor History of a particular device the client sends the following POST request to the GetVisitorHistory service URL.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve the visitor history for a device
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a record of all clients that have accessed the location or location history of a specified device. Visitor history is automatically recorded with each location query. Returns a list of visitor records including identifiers and access timestamps. The server maintains a configurable maximum number of visitor records per device; older records are automatically removed when the limit is exceeded. Requires the device ID in the request.
data.reasoning: Missing summary and incomplete description. Clarified what 'visitor' means (clients accessing location data), what is returned (list of visitor records with identifiers and timestamps), and the automatic pruning behavior. This helps AI agents understand the operation's purpose and when to use it.

message: Operation 'updateLocation' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Missing summary and incomplete description. Clarified the dual purpose (update existing or create new device), what inputs are required, what is returned, and important side effects (device creation, history storage). This helps AI agents understand when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description: This method is used to update the location of a device. The device does not need to be known already to the Miataru server but it rather creates a unique identifier for itself in the client application. This unique identifier, or device ID is then used to address this particular device.
data.summary_suggestion: Update or register a device's current location
data.description_suggestion: Updates the current location for a device. If the device is not yet known to the server, a new device record is automatically created with a unique identifier. Requires device ID and location coordinates in the request. Optionally accepts EnableLocationHistory flag to control whether location history is stored. Returns an acknowledgment response. Side effects: Creates new device records on first update, stores location data, and optionally maintains location history if enabled.
data.reasoning: Missing summary and incomplete description. Clarified the dual purpose (update existing or create new device), what inputs are required, what is returned, and important side effects (device creation, history storage). This helps AI agents understand when and how to use this operation.
